name: Platform Jumper (Demo Level)
description:
Make your way to the finish sign as PJ, a lumberjack who can throw his axe, and then use it as a platform to cross large gaps and climb high walls! Collect coins and powerups along the way to maximize your score, as well as five colored feathers hidden throughout the level. 

This 2D pixel-platformer is still very much work in progress, and pretty much anything could still be subject to change. That being said, I think this demo level gives a good indication of the direction I want to take this game in. If you have any suggestions on how I could improve this project, don't hesitate to tell me in the comments! 

Controls:

- A / D or left / right arrow keys: move left / right

- Space or up arrow key: jump

- Lshift or down arrow key: axe swing (on ground), axe throw (in air) 

- Esc: pause game
